title: Combinations of approved oral nucleoside analogues confer potent suppression of alphaviruses in vitro and in vivo.

title: beta-D-N(4)-hydroxycytidine (NHC, EIDD-1931) inhibits chikungunya virus replication in mosquito cells and ex vivo Aedes aegypti guts, but not when ingested during blood-feeding.
